title: Dustman's Cairn: Wuuthrad Fragment and the Word Wall
session_summary: Elitrof ran Dustman's Cairn solo on Harbinger-sanctioned trial. He fought through Silver Hand hunters, disarmed Nordic traps, slew a Draugr Overlord, and recovered the Wuuthrad fragment. He learned YOL (Fire Breath) from the Word Wall inside the cairn and used Fire Breath unmastered in a critical duel. Elemental Fury Mastery advanced to 4/8 via dramatic three-word use. A Silver Hand survivor escaped. Post-cairn milestones spent to upgrade the Ulran-Vjarn pelt into an Artifact Extra.
key_events: Harbinger-sanctioned solo trial: enter Dustman's Cairn alone
Silver Hand cell inside cairn engaged; hunters defeated
Draugr Overlord slain in single combat at the relic chamber
Word Wall YOL (Fire) learned; Fire Breath Mastery now 2/8
Elemental Fury used dramatically (3-word full shout); Mastery advanced to 4/8
Silver Hand survivor escaped — vendetta clock ticks
Post-session: Minor Milestone x2 spent on Pack Tactics → Ulran-Vjarn Artifact Extra (L1/3)
npcs_encountered: Farkas - shield-sibling (in Jorrvaskr; available on horn call)
Vilkas - shield-sibling (in Whiterun after Dragonsreach hearing)
Silver Hand hunters (cairn cell; defeated or fled)
locations_visited: Dustman's Cairn (interior — trap corridors, relic chamber, Word Wall)
loot_acquired: Wuuthrad Fragment (Quest Item) — recovered from relic chamber
Rune-Etched Ancient Nord Torc (Hearth-Ward) — minor enchant, warmth vs cold
notes: End-of-session state: Elitrof FP 1, Mild consequence: Sliced Upper Arm (cleared next session), physical stress partially marked. Fire Breath Mastery 2/8. Elemental Fury Mastery 4/8. Minor Milestone x2 spent post-session: Pack Tactics (Companion Drill) replaced by Pelt of the Great Werebear Ulran-Vjarn Artifact Extra (L1/3). Silver Hand survivor escaped — Silver Hand Vendetta clock ticks. Log: logs/2026-02-23_session-02_Elitrof_Act1_LATEST.md
next_session_prep: Elitrof exits Dustman's Cairn at dawn with Wuuthrad fragment
Road back to Whiterun; Silver Hand may have set watchers after survivor report
